Ice spiders are found in the Temple of Ikov (dungeon), and in the Ice Queen's lair underneath White Wolf Mountain. Like jungle spiders, they do not show up on the minimap.

These spiders have low strength, defence and life points for their level, but hit very accurately even through armour.

They sometimes drop charms, but are rarely trained on as most of them are in the deep wilderness and they frequently drop nothing.

Universal drops[edit | edit source]

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.
Item Quantity Rarity GE price High Alch
Key token1RareNot soldNot alchemisable

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • update 1 August 2022 (Update):
    • Removed the ice warriors, ice giants and ice spiders from the Frozen Waste Plateau, replacing them with glacors, wyverns and acheron mammoths respectively.
  • patch 18 March 2013 (Update):
    • Grotworms, moss giants, banshees, jungle spiders, shadow spiders, spiders, giant spiders, deadly red spiders, ice spiders, scorpions, poison scorpions and pit scorpion will no longer hit for 1 hit point worth of damage.
  • update 27 February 2002 (Update):
    • Added to game.
